name: node-project-template

scripts.docs: jsdoc dummyCode/ -d jsdocsgenerated && git checkout -b documentation && git add -A && git -c user.email='action@github.com' -c user.name='Github Action' commit -m 'Generated JSDocs' && git push origin documentation
scripts.serve: echo 'TODO: Add your serve command here
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp src/*.js build # TODO: Replace with your build command
scripts.preversion: git fetch --tags && npm run lint:check && npm test

description: Template for creating Node.js projects including docs and a deploy pipeline
author: MichaelCurrin
